name: Constellation Exploration - Ludum Dare 39 (compo)
description:
I've decided to participate Ludum Dare's Compo after it started. This game was made in around of 20 hours. Was a tough time. I used Photoshop and Unity 2017.

Use the key arrows to move and spacebar to dash.

Please, rate the game here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/constellation-exploration
